article.title: Cyrus
article.paragraph: Cyrusis an English transliteration of the Persian nameKourosh (disambiguation)Kourosh. For the etymology, seeCyrus (name).
article.heading: Persian monarchy

list.listitem: Cyrus I(ca. 650 BC), King of Anshan
Cyrus the Great(ca. 600 BC or 576 BC530 BC) also known as Cyrus II the grandson of Cyrus I, an Achaemenid ruler and the founder of the Great Persian Empire
(See also:Cyrus Cylinder,Cyrus in the Judeo-Christian traditionandCyrus the Great in the Quran)
Cyrus the Younger(died 401 BC), brother to the Persian King Artaxerxes
